subsections.contenten: I am interested in investigating spatio-temporal data representation learning, multimodal fusion, and time-series prediction techniques. We research on large-scale spatio-temporal models and explore the efficiency and reliability of generative spatio-temporal models.
subsections.contentzh: 研究时空数据表示学习，多模态融合，时序预测技术。研究时空大模型，探索生成式时空模型的效率与可靠性。

subsections.contenten: We investigate substructure representation learning techniques for spatio-temporal and dynamic graphs, aiming to enhance the interpretability, robustness, and transferability of graph-based tasks through the discovery of invariant substructures.
subsections.contentzh: 研究时空图与动态图的子结构表示学习方法，通过挖掘不变子结构特征，提升图任务的可解释性、鲁棒性和跨任务迁移能力。
